justification: “Subjects fixation patterns were recorded at 50 Hz using a Tobii desktop-mounted eyetracker.”

measured_by: -10 to 10 slider rating of 70 snack items
justification: “Participants first provided liking-ratings for 70 snack items on a -10 to 10 scale, which are used as an independent measure of the items' true values.”

measured_by: Binary food choice task (two-item choices via left/right arrow keys)
justification: “In the choice phase, subjects made their choices by pressing the left or right arrow keys on the keyboard.”

measured_by: Trinary food choice task (three-item choices via left/down/right arrow keys)
justification: “Subjects indicated their choice by pressing the left, down, or right arrow keys for the left, center, and right items, respectively.”
